tasks.title: Initialize Astro Project with Tailwind CSS
tasks.description: Set up the foundational Astro 4.x project with Tailwind CSS 3.x configuration, including all necessary dependencies and project structure as specified in the PRD.
tasks.details:
1. Initialize new Astro project: `npm create astro@latest -- --template minimal`
2. Install Tailwind CSS: `npx astro add tailwind`
3. Install additional dependencies: Inter font via `@fontsource/inter`, JetBrains Mono via `@fontsource/jetbrains-mono`
4. Configure `tailwind.config.cjs` with PRD color system:
   - Primary colors: #3b82f6, #1e40af, #60a5fa, #10b981 (Evolve Teal)
   - Neutral colors: #111827, #374151, #4b5563, #9ca3af, #f3f4f6
   - Typography: Inter font family with specified scale
5. Create `src/styles/global.css` with base styles, CSS custom properties, and utility classes
6. Configure `astro.config.mjs` for static site generation
7. Set up project folder structure as per PRD:
   - src/layouts/, src/components/, src/pages/, src/content/legal/, src/styles/
   - public/ for static assets
8. Install `@astrojs/sitemap` for automatic sitemap generation
9. Configure TypeScript (tsconfig.json) if needed
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Run `npm run dev` and verify development server starts without errors
2. Confirm Tailwind classes compile correctly in a test component
3. Verify Inter font loads properly in browser
4. Check that project structure matches PRD specification
5. Validate astro.config.mjs settings by running `npm run build`

tasks.title: Configure Deployment and Domain Setup for Cloudflare Pages
tasks.description: Set up Cloudflare Pages deployment, configure custom domains (pixel-evolve.com and translate.pixel-evolve.com), verify SSL, and perform final testing.
tasks.details:
1. Prepare for deployment:
   - Ensure `npm run build` completes without errors
   - Verify dist/ folder contains all static assets
   - Check sitemap.xml is generated

2. GitHub repository setup:
   - Initialize git repository if not done
   - Create .gitignore for node_modules, dist, .env
   - Push to GitHub

3. Cloudflare Pages configuration:
   - Connect GitHub repository to Cloudflare Pages
   - Configure build settings:
     - Build command: `npm run build`
     - Build output directory: `dist`
     - Node.js version: 18.x or 20.x

4. Domain configuration:
   - Add pixel-evolve.com as custom domain
   - Configure translate.pixel-evolve.com subdomain
   - For multi-repo approach: Set up separate Cloudflare Pages project for product site

5. SSL/TLS verification:
   - Verify HTTPS works on both domains
   - Check SSL certificate auto-renewal is enabled

6. Post-deployment verification:
   - Submit sitemap to Google Search Console
   - Verify robots.txt is accessible
   - Test all pages on production URLs
   - Verify Cookie Banner functionality
   - Run Lighthouse audits on production

7. DNS propagation monitoring (may take up to 24-48 hours)
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Verify build completes successfully in Cloudflare
2. Test both domains resolve correctly with HTTPS
3. Verify SSL certificates are valid and auto-renewing
4. Test all pages load correctly on production
5. Validate sitemap is accessible at canonical URLs
6. Run Lighthouse audits: target >90 performance, >90 accessibility
7. Test Cookie Banner on fresh browser session
8. Verify JSON-LD appears in Google Search Console
9. Test mobile experience on actual devices
